name: Planet Stranded
description:
You've crash-landed on a planet. Explore and fix the ship by collecting your broken ship parts. But don't go out for too long, you lose oxygen overtime. Keep going back to your shuttle to replenish your oxigen.

The planet is inhabited by exploding cacti. Avoid these as damaging your suit also means losing oxygen faster. Fixing your suit will be necessary to survive at that point.

WASD / Arrows to move.

Collide with objects to interact with them.

Game was made for the VimJam
